近人.definition: contemporary; modern person; close friend; associate; intimate

近代.definition: the not-very-distant past; modern times, excluding recent decades; (in the context of Chinese history) the period from the Opium Wars until the May 4th Movement (mid-19th century to 1919); capitalist times (pre-1949)

近代史.definition: modern history (for China, from the Opium Wars until the fall of the Qing Dynasty, i.e. mid-19th to early 20th century)

近前.definition: to come close; to get near to; front

近古.definition: near ancient history (often taken to mean Song, Yuan, Ming and Qing times)

近在咫尺.definition: (idiom) very close; almost within reach; close at hand

近在眼前.definition: right under one's nose; right in front of one's eyes; close at hand; imminent

近打.definition: Kinta valley and river in Perak, Malaysia

近日.definition: (in) the past few days; recently; (within) the next few days

近日點.definition: perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun; lower apsis

近景.definition: scene in the foreground; nearby scenery; (photography) a close shot; the present situation; how things stand

近期.definition: near in time; in the near future; very soon; recent

近朱者赤，近墨者黑.pinyin: jin4 zhu1 zhe3 chi4 , jin4 mo4 zhe3 hei1
近朱者赤，近墨者黑.definition: those who handle cinnabar are stained red; those who work with ink are stained black (idiom); you are the product of your environment

近朱近墨.definition: one is judged by the company one keeps (idiom)

近水樓臺.definition: lit. a pavilion near the water (idiom); fig. using one's proximity to the powerful to obtain favor

近水樓臺先得月.pinyin: jin4 shui3 lou2 tai2 xian1 de2 yue4
近水樓臺先得月.definition: the pavilion closest to the water enjoys moonlight first (idiom); to benefit from intimacy with an influential person

近畿地方.definition: the Kinki region of Japan, aka the Kansai region, with cities including Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe

近臣.definition: member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)

近衛文麿.definition: Prince KONOE Fumimaro (1891-), Japanese nobleman and militarist politician, prime minister 1937-1939 and 1940-1941

近距離無線通訊.pinyin: jin4 ju4 li2 wu2 xian4 tong1 xun4

近體詩.definition: a genre of poetry, developed in the Tang Dynasty, characterized by its strict form
